name: The Scenic Treasures - Japanese Learning
description:
Usually learning a new language requires significant determination and dedication, but this game requires neither! The Scenic Treasures offers a very unique experience where you will travel around Japan and multiple countries and search for treasures. Scrolls you happen to obtain will instruct you where to go or what to do, but you need to solve puzzles to gain instructions.

The Scenic Treasures - Japanese Learning aims to provide an innovative method to learn the Japanese language. We have made the learning process intuitive so that players can learn the Japanese language very naturally with minimal effort. By the end of the journey, you will have learned the basics of the language.

In this game, players will master all the Hiragana and Katakana characters, learn hundreds of Japanese words and how those words are used in sentences (grammar). If you are interested in learning the Japanese language, this game will be an excellent starting point. Even if you are not interested, knowing the basics of a language must be useful and will deepen your insight into the world.

Learning a language should not be something stressful. With this game, learning a language is like solving puzzles and finding treasures!

Story
One day, in your warehouse you happen to find a letter written in English and scrolls written in a language you are not familiar with. The letter says if you fill in the blanks in the scrolls, they will lead you to treasures and if you gather all the treasures, something magnificent will happen to the world. It seems the first treasures you are supposed to find are located in Japan and the scrolls are written in Japanese. Fortunately, you have got plenty of time, so you have decided to head for the country to gather the treasures. Now your journey will begin.

Features
Players will master all the Hiragana characters

Players will master all the Katakana characters

Players will learn hundreds of Japanese words

Players will learn the Japanese grammar and understand how sentences are structured

Players will travel around Japan and several countries

The game will offer engaging treasure hunting gameplay
